content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0dbfe53d-5873-4f0f-99dc-da876b532ef5/image2018-7-31_12-17-48.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":681,\"height\":113}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is growing to a global software solutions and services provider. We achieved it because we provide our customer not only with dedication, knowledge and quality, but also with the innovations. It is very important for us to be different from other companies that work for Thomson Reuters. The goals of the EPAM\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://innovations.epam.com/TR/Epam.Users/Account/LogOn?returnUrl=%2FTR%2FProgramAbout\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Innovation Program for Thomson Reuters\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are to bring ideas and innovations to customer processes and product, and by this have our customer recognize and perceive the value of working with EPAM. You can join \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://innovations.epam.com/TR/Epam.Users/Account/LogOn?returnUrl=%2FTR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the innovations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" by submitting new ideas, sharing interesting inspirational resources, or helping to elaborate and implement ideas that are already submitted on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://innovations.epam.com/TR/Epam.Users/Account/LogOn?returnUrl=%2FTR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Innovation Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please press the <DONE> button only after you have checked the innovation portal and know how to submit new ideas\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
